data.text: @juli_bg_bs Hong kong is worrying because the vaccine they're using isn't good

@Hepta7bi2 @ferfuroli @juli_bg_bs @raf25b12 Não estamos, Octa. Eu conheço vc. Isso é falando do cenário geral. E de fato tem muita gente que prefere só ver o que quer (me acusaram até de ser GBD, tive treta pra caramba aqui ultimamente só por falar o óbvio, tentativas descaradas de me fazer parar de falar).

@ferfuroli @gutoaqui @juli_bg_bs @raf25b12 Discordância quanto a como tratar o asteroide não significa negar o asteróide.

Não me ridicularize, por favor. Tô sendo educado com todo mundo aqui.
@gutoaqui @juli_bg_bs @Hepta7bi2 @raf25b12 People are making the choice not to look up. 😂

@gutoaqui @Hepta7bi2 @raf25b12 Also this thread might be helpful

https://t.co/g0zjm7fmKO
@Hepta7bi2 @juli_bg_bs @raf25b12 We have imprinting. The vaccine won't work as you expect. The Wuhan induced response will be immunodominant anyway.

@juli_bg_bs @gutoaqui @raf25b12 I don't much Care about me anymore.

Talking about the whole picture. 

Updating the vaccine ele have won't do any harm and Will bring Benefits. 

Why not?
@Hepta7bi2 @gutoaqui @raf25b12 I am not denying symptomatic covid. I am just telling you that you will get covid. Whether you like it or not. Its not a choice. Feel free to dislike me🤷‍♀️

@juli_bg_bs @gutoaqui @raf25b12 This fits more on you guys than in me.

Denying the problems of symptomatic covid is also denying reality
